title: Ngai teh van Lal Fa chu Bethlehem bawng in tlawmah
lyrics:
Ngai teh, van Lal Fa chu, Bethlehem bawng in tlawmah,
Hringmi hraichawiin a lo piang a;
A Lal ropuina van thutthleng chu rawn pelin,
Min tlan turin bawng in tlawmah a lo piang a.

Kan lawm a che, lei leh van Lal ropui,
Theihtawpin i fak hla kan sa ang;
Riangvaite leh retheite Lalpa,
Hmanah Bethlehem-ah i tan hmun a awm lo,
Tunah erawh i tan hmun a awm kan zingah.

A pianna hmun rethei - Bethlehem bawng in lo chu,
A tan hmun dang a awm ve si lo;
A lu a nghat a, Bethlehem bawng in tlawmah,
Lei lalte leh ama mite'n an duh si lo.

Lal chungnung, hmun chungnung bera cheng hnu Lal Isua,
Lei lalte'n amah do mah sela;
Kei ka tan erawh Lal duhawm ber a ni si,
Riangvai kan lawmna tur renga Lal lo piang hi.

Hmanah Eden huana nunna kraun hlu kan hloh kha,
Tunah Lalpan min chharsak leh ta;
A tawngkam chhuak hmangaihna, riangvai min hnemtu,
Varparh arsi aia eng mawi Lal duhawm hi.

Hmanah chuan Bethlehem-ah i tan hmun a awm lo,
Nang mi thianghlim van Lal pianna tur;
Tunah erawh hetah i tan hmun a awm e,
Isu, kan hnenah lo cheng la, min awmpui rawh.
